import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' const BreadCrumb = (props) => { const [showBreadcrumb, setShowBreadCrumb] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { let url = window.location.href, urlArr = url.split('/') setShowBreadCrumb(urlArr) }, []) return (
Home Nuestra Notaria
) } export default BreadCrumb
